  • Bio-Dev Tools

    Create your own point-of-need solutions

Want to configure your own custom assay?

Now you can port your real-time qPCR assays into our field-friendly Go-Strip format. With custom Go-Strips, there is no need for refrigeration, lab equipment, or mixing wet reagents in the field.
